channel.title: jshint on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in jshint on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: CLDR, Composer, NPM, JSHint, oh my!
item.description: As those of you who regularly look at the commits being merged in the ‘develop’ branch know, the forthcoming 1.7.0.0 version of PrestaShop now includes a few notable improvements. These are all part of our plan to modernize the codebase, and provide you with a professional e-commerce tool! CLDR: managing local numbers the right way PrestaShop 1.7 now implements part of the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository standard in order to better manage currency and price listing.
